lines.text: So... what if the Go Wizard wanted to get the heck out of dodge?
That <c=#FF6000>Emergency Exit</c> spell! If there were a fire, he could've tried to use it to escape from Emmup!
So, he started a fire, and-
Hold on, hold on. You're gettin' ahead of yourself again.
What I want to know is how the fire actually got started. You're spinnin' some kind of story about motive.
Could be you're right. You're <c=#FF00FF>probably right.</c> But let's take things one at a time.
